# simple-config

## Properties

| Property          | Attribute           | Description                                          | Type      | Default                 |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------- |
| `aNumber`         | `a-number`          | A simple number field                                | `number`  | `555`                   |
| `bNumber`         | `b-number`          | Another number field                                 | `number`  | `46`                    |
| `backgroundColor` | `background-color`  | A string field which represents a color              | `string`  | `undefined`             |
| `isChecked`       | `is-checked`        | A boolean field                                      | `boolean` | `true`                  |
| `poorlyNamedProp` | `poorly-named-prop` | A poorly named field which should hold a color value | `string`  | `undefined`             |
| `simpleText`      | `simple-text`       | A simple text field                                  | `string`  | `"simple in the band!"` |
| `startDate`       | `start-date`        | A date field                                         | `string`  | `undefined`             |
